meanings.definition: In a clumsy or unskilled manner
meanings.sent1: She unadeptly tripped over the uneven pavement.
meanings.sent2: He unadeptly tried to juggle the balls but dropped them all.
meanings.sent3: The magician unadeptly pulled a rabbit out of his hat, but it was a rubber toy!
meanings.sent4: Her fingers moved unadeptly on the piano keys, creating a discordant melody.
meanings.sent5: The chef unadeptly flipped the pancake, causing it to land on the floor.

meanings.sent1: The unadeptly crafted chair wobbled when sat upon.
meanings.sent2: She felt unadeptly at painting, often mixing the wrong colors.
meanings.sent3: The unadeptly written poem made everyone chuckle at its simplicity.
meanings.sent4: His unadeptly built sandcastle crumbled as soon as the tide came in.
meanings.sent5: The unadeptly sewn dress fell apart at the seams after just one wear.
